readable.content: A woman in jeans rests on a bench in a gallery or shop setting . A woman wearing a blue shirt sits on a white bench . The lady in the aqua shirt and blue jeans is sitting on a white bench . The woman in the blue shirt sits on a bench in a museum as others pass her by . Woman sitting alone with drink on a bench as people walk by .
